organizations: Royal Lytham & St. Annes Golf Club
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott made four straight bogeys on the final four holes at Royal Lytham & St. Annes Golf Club, leaving a grand opportunity for Ernie Els, who managed to win the British Open by one stroke on Sunday.
snippet: Adam Scott made four straight bogeys on the final four holes at Royal Lytham & St. Annes Golf Club, leaving a grand opportunity for Ernie Els, who managed to win the British Open by one stroke on Sunday.
